panels.title: Number of Active BGP FS Rules

targets.query: SELECT last("prefix_masklen_distribution/unicast_prefix/number_of_prefixes") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-fib-common-oper:fib/nodes/node/protocols/protocol/fib-summaries/fib-summary" WHERE ("source" = '8812-1' AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0' AND "protocol_name" = 'ipv4' AND "vrf_name" = 'default') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "prefix_masklen_distribution/unicast_prefix/mask_length"

SELECT derivative("message_statistics/update/rx/count", 1s) FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-oper:bgp/instances/instance/instance-active/default-vrf/neighbors/neighbor" WHERE ("source" = '8201-32FH') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "neighbor_address"

SELECT "npu_hwr/bank/counter/inuse_entries" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-platforms-ofa-oper:ofa/stats/nodes/node/Cisco-IOS-XR-8000-platforms-npu-resources-oper:hw-resources-datas/hw-resources-data" WHERE ("source" = '8201-32FH' AND "resource" = 'lpm-tcam' AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "npu_hwr/bank/bank_name", "npu_hwr/npu_id"

SELECT "npu_hwr/bank/counter/inuse_entries" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-platforms-ofa-oper:ofa/stats/nodes/node/Cisco-IOS-XR-8000-platforms-npu-resources-oper:hw-resources-datas/hw-resources-data" WHERE ("source" = '8201-32FH' AND "resource" = 'lpm-tcam' AND "npu_hwr/bank/bank_name" = 'v6_lpm' AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "npu_hwr/bank/bank_name"

SELECT "npu_hwr/bank/counter/inuse_entries" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-platforms-ofa-oper:ofa/stats/nodes/node/Cisco-IOS-XR-8000-platforms-npu-resources-oper:hw-resources-datas/hw-resources-data" WHERE ("source" = '8201-32FH' AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0' AND "resource" = 'lpm-tcam' AND "npu_hwr/npu_id" = '0' AND "npu_hwr/bank/bank_name" = 'lpm_tcam') AND $timeFilter

SELECT last("npu_hwr/bank/counter/inuse_entries") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-platforms-ofa-oper:ofa/stats/nodes/node/Cisco-IOS-XR-8000-platforms-npu-resources-oper:hw-resources-datas/hw-resources-data" WHERE ("source" = '8201-32FH' AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0' AND "npu_hwr/bank/bank_name" = 'v4_lpm') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("npu_hwr/bank/counter/inuse_entries") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-platforms-ofa-oper:ofa/stats/nodes/node/Cisco-IOS-XR-8000-platforms-npu-resources-oper:hw-resources-datas/hw-resources-data" WHERE ("source" = '8201-32FH' AND "npu_hwr/bank/bank_name" = 'v6_lpm' AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
